message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and leave you 10%. Hopefully we can work something out before the money starts losing value!
I appreciate the offer, but let's be realistic. How about a 70/30 split in my favor? Time is ticking and the money's losing value for me.
Okay, let's compromise. 60/40 split in my favor. We both get more than your last offer, and we're closer to an agreement.
We're getting closer. I'll come down a bit to 65% for me. It's a good deal that accounts for the time pressure.
